algorithm_technique: Sum up all positive price differences between consecutive days.
Sum up all positive price differences between consecutive days using map and lambda.
problem_summary_simple: Maximize profit by buying and selling a stock multiple times, with no cooldown period.
problem_summary_technical: Sum of all positive differences between adjacent prices. This captures all upward trends, effectively buying low and selling high whenever possible.
key_insights: The key insight is that we can buy and sell on the same day, which means we can capture every upward price movement.
If the price increases from day `i` to day `i+1`, we can buy on day `i` and sell on day `i+1` to gain `prices[i+1] - prices[i]` profit.
Summing all such positive differences gives the maximum possible profit.
